vars.label: Overlap the following section
vars.description: Sections will only overlap each other, if it's supported by the style. Otherwise it has no visual effect.

vars.label: Text
vars.description: Add an optional section title.

vars.label: Position
vars.description: Define the title's position within the section.

vars.label: Rotation
vars.description: Rotate the title 90 degrees clockwise or counterclockwise.

vars.label: Breakpoint
vars.description: The section title will be displayed on the defined screen size and larger.

vars.label: Image
vars.description: Upload a background image.

vars.label: Image Size
vars.description: Determine whether the image will fit the section dimensions by clipping it or by filling the empty areas with the background color.

vars.label: Image Position
vars.description: Set the initial background position, relative to the section layer.

vars.label: Image Effect
vars.description: Add a parallax effect or fix the background with regard to the viewport while scrolling.

vars.label: Image Visibility
vars.description: Display the image only on this device width and larger.

vars.label: Video
vars.description: Select a video file or enter a link from YouTube or Vimeo.

vars.label: Text Color
vars.description: Disable automatic text recoloring, for example when you use cards inside sections.

vars.label: Text Color
vars.description: Set light or dark color mode for text, buttons and controls.

vars.label: Max Width
vars.description: Set the maximum content width.

vars.label: Height
vars.description: Enabling viewport height on a section that directly follows the header will subtract the header's height from it. On short pages, a section can be expanded to fill the browser window.

vars.label: Vertical Alignment
vars.description: Align the section content vertically, if the section height is larger than the content itself.

vars.label: Padding
vars.description: Set the vertical padding.

vars.label: Pull content beneath navbar
vars.description: Make the header transparent and overlay the section background. Select dark or light text. Note: This only applies, if the section directly follows the header.

vars.label: Delay element animations.
vars.description: Apply an animation to elements once they enter the viewport. Slide animations can come into effect with a fixed offset or at 100% of the element's own size.

vars.label: Name
vars.description: Define a name to easily indentify this element inside the builder.

vars.label: ID
vars.description: Define a unique identifier for the element.

vars.label: Class
vars.description: Define one or more class names for the element. Separate multiple classes with spaces.

vars.label: CSS
vars.description: Enter your own custom CSS. The following selectors will be prefixed automatically for this element: .el-section
